content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"                        xmlns:geo="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/geo/1.0/"                        xmlns:time="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/time/1.0/">   <ShortName>MODAPS Dataset Search</ShortName>   <Description>Use MODAPS Dataset Search to obtain a list of Earth Science Data Sets</Description>   <Tags>MODAPS Dataset Search</Tags>   <Contact>MODAPSUSO@lists.nasa.gov</Contact>   <Url type="application/atom+xml"      template="http://modwebsrv.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/axis2/services/MODAPSservices/searchDatasets?pattern={searchTerms}"/>   <Query role="example" searchTerms="adjusted reflectance"/> </OpenSearchDescription>
